scenario_text.value:
Oh dearie me. I can’t tend to my fields if
I can’t get through.

A landslide, how frightful... Nothing but
strange things happen around these parts.

You got that right. This keeps up, all the
old timers are gonna blame it on monsters.

Now, now... Don’t say such things in front of
the children.

Hey now, don’t let them young ’uns get too
close! They’ll be cursed!
Cursed? Say what? You feeling okay, granny?
We, like, don’t believe in that kinda stuff, y’know?

Believe it or not, the Kemonogami curse will
find you! Kids should stay away!

Pshaw, you gotta be kidding me! Ain’t no one
believe in that hocus pocus these days.

Ha ha, wow. I love it out here in the sticks.
These old timers know how to crack a joke!

Enough with the lockdown, g’wan and get
searching already! Otherwise, them kids’ll...

Yes, yes, calm down, ma’am. We’ll do a thorough
investigation, so please wait a bit longer.

Dagnabbit! You lawmen are always the same!
Each and everyone one of youse!

(They’re asking when the blockade’s gonna
lift. Looks like they don’t know yet...)
